title: SDE-1
description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer on Klaviss, a US-based real estate platform, where I directly interacted with the client, developed key features, implemented an LLM-powered prompt system for PDF data extraction, and resolved major issues. I also led the frontend setup of GenHR, an HRMS tool, building reusable components and scalable modules from scratch.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Worked across multiple projects during my time as a Full Stack Developer. Developed the frontend for Wild Wheat Bakery’s website and contributed to several modules of IRCTC Tejas-NfTtrace, including a feedback system to enhance user engagement. On the NFTtrace mobile app, I built the Support and Offer modules for both frontend and backend, and integrated Firebase into the Sutr project for real-time sync and authentication. Also, resolved critical bugs in the Obortech project and optimized Chaincode’s website for better performance and interaction.
